law.text:
As used in KRS 214.552 to 214.556:
"Department" means the Department for Public Health of the Cabinet for Health and Family Services.
"Fund" means the breast cancer screening fund.
"Screening" means the conduct of screening mammography for the purpose of ascertaining the existence of any physiological abnormality which might be indicative of the presence of disease.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 461, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 408, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 184, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 2, effective July 1, 1990.
